wz:done.visible: !#empty(newChangeProductPriceBundleRule.id) and newChangeProductPriceBundleRule.catalogVersion != null and newChangeProductPriceBundleRule.targetProducts!=null and newChangeProductPriceBundleRule.targetProducts.size()!=0 and newChangeProductPriceBundleRule.price > 0 and newChangeProductPriceBundleRule.bundleTemplate != null

wz:next.visible: !#empty(item.number) AND item.travelProvider != null AND item.startDate != null AND item.endDate != null AND item.travelSector != null
